law.catch_line: Dam and reservoir construction and operation.
law.text: The authority may construct, operate, and maintain a dam and reservoir on the West Fork Drakes Creek and foster recreational and economic developmental projects that would utilize these resources. The construction of this dam and reservoir shall not commence until the authority has first obtained the consent and approval of all necessary regulatory bodies.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 381, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1990.
